json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="dbPlans">
<prop type="array" name="nsgCidrs">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="scanIpIds">
<prop type="array" name="sshPublicKeys" required="True">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="vipIds">
<prop type="array" name="zones">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

command.name: create
command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.nsgCidrs" options="nsg-cidrs" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.sshPublicKeys" options="ssh-public-keys" group="Properties">

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="nsgCidrs" arg="$resource.properties.nsgCidrs">
<prop type="array" name="sshPublicKeys" arg="$resource.properties.sshPublicKeys" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="zones" arg="$resource.zones">

<prop type="array" name="nsgCidrs">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="scanIpIds">
<prop type="array" name="sshPublicKeys" required="True">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="vipIds">
<prop type="array" name="zones">

help.short: The number of nodes in the Exadata VM cluster on Exascale Infrastructure.
